description:
Usagi and Luna encounter a little girl who appears to be lost. The two later return home that day and are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagi’s house as her younger sister.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Invaders from Outer Space: The Coming of Siren
Invasión desde el espacio. Sirena llega volando.
Uchuu kara no Shinryaku! Siren Hirai
宇宙からの侵略! セイレーン飛来
